result.eng: A light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.

result.orig: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht
result.html: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíochtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a ċuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faoḃar ar a cruṫaíoċtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.

result.eng: There was a great buzz in the place.
result.ga: Bhí bús iontach san áit
result.orig: Bhí bús iontach san áit
result.html: Bhí bús iontach san áitThere was a great buzz in the place.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí bús iontaċ san áitThere was a great buzz in the place.

result.eng: Their legs were splashing about in the cool water.
result.ga: Bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuair
result.orig: Bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuair
result.html: Bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuairTheir legs were splashing about in the cool water.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuairTheir legs were splashing about in the cool water.

result.eng: She went into the storage place crouching.
result.ga: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromada
result.orig: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromada
result.html: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromadaShe went into the storage place crouching.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sí isteaċ san ionad stórála ar a cromadaShe went into the storage place crouching.

result.eng: The incident that happened was a relic of the old era.
result.ga: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharla
result.orig: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharla
result.html: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharlaThe incident that happened was a relic of the old era.
result.ponchtml: Iarsma den tseanré a ḃí san eaċtra a ṫarlaThe incident that happened was a relic of the old era.

result.eng: Four weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ga: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.orig: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.html: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san AfganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ponchtml: Ceiṫre seaċtainí i ndiaiḋ na n-ionsaiṫe rinne fórsaí Ṁeiriceá ionruaṫar isteaċ san AfganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.

result.eng: When I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.
result.ga: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramach
result.orig: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramach
result.html: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramachWhen I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a tugaḋ mo roġa seomra dom san óstán d'ḟreagraíos go cúramaċWhen I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.

result.eng: Twitter, the choice means of communication in fashion right now.
result.ga: Twitter an toighis chumarsáide is mó atá i bhfaisean san am i láthair
result.orig: Twitter an toighis chumarsáide is mó atá i bhfaisean san am i láthair

result.eng: Of course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
result.ga: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaithe
result.orig: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaithe
result.html: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaitheOf course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
result.ponchtml: Ar ndóiġ ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a ḃí na trádálaiṫeOf course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.

result.eng: From this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ga: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.orig: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.html: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ponchtml: As an am seo amaċ b'iad scláḃaiṫe forṁór mór na ndaoine gorma a facṫas san Eoraip agus sa doṁan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.

result.eng: By the end of the 17th century slave ownership was ended in Europe.
result.ga: Faoi dheireadh an 17ú haois bhí deireadh le húinéireacht sclábhaithe san Eoraip
result.orig: Faoi dheireadh an 17ú haois bhí deireadh le húinéireacht sclábhaithe san Eoraip
result.html: Faoi dheireadh an 17ú haois bhí deireadh le húinéireacht sclábhaithe san EoraipBy the end of the 17th century slave ownership was ended in Europe.
result.ponchtml: Faoi ḋeireaḋ an 17ú haois ḃí deireaḋ le húinéireaċt scláḃaiṫe san EoraipBy the end of the 17th century slave ownership was ended in Europe.

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ga: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.orig: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.html: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíochtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ponchtml: Mar a leaṫ an tír siar amaċ ṫáinig níos mó stáit isteaċ san aontaċt nár ġlac le scláḃaíoċtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.

result.eng: He had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.
result.ga: Ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am air
result.orig: Ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am air
result.html: Ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am airHe had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ bríste nó a ḋaṫ san am airHe had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.

result.eng: But him playing with little boats, at his age!
result.ga: Ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé ann
result.orig: Ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé ann
result.html: Ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé annBut him playing with little boats, at his age!
result.ponchtml: Aċ eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snáṁ san aois a ḃfuil sé annBut him playing with little boats, at his age!

result.eng: At your age...
result.ga: San aois a bhfuil tú ann
result.orig: San aois a bhfuil tú ann
result.html: San aois a bhfuil tú annAt your age...
result.ponchtml: San aois a ḃfuil tú annAt your age...

result.eng: He was one foot in the grave.
result.ga: Bhí cos amuigh is cos istigh san uaigh aige
result.orig: Bhí cos amuigh is cos istigh san uaigh aige
result.html: Bhí cos amuigh is cos istigh san uaigh aigeHe was one foot in the grave.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cos amuiġ is cos istiġ san uaiġ aigeHe was one foot in the grave.
